article_title: The price-hike letter Amazon.com sent to its Prime subscribers: New price $99
article_text:
Saying the annual cost of a Prime subscription had held steady for nine years, Amazon /quotes/zigman/63011/delayed /quotes/nls/amzn AMZN told subscribers early Thursday that the price would jump $20 upon their next renewal.

Here’s a screen capture of the letter sent to one of the reported 20 million–plus subscribers to the free-shipping and video-streaming service:

If you received this letter — or even if you didn’t — give us your reaction:
